io.odysz.semantic.jserv.U

Class AnUpdateReq

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.odysz.anson.Anson
      • io.odysz.semantic.jprotocol.AnsonBody
        • io.odysz.semantic.jserv.U.AnUpdateReq
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.odysz.anson.IJsonable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnInsertReq

    public class AnUpdateReq
extends AnsonBody

    Insert Request Message

    Note:

    InsertReq is a subclass of UpdateReq, and have no IJsonable.toBlock(JsonOpt) and Anson.fromJson(java.io.InputStream) implementation. Otherwise any post updating list in request won't work.

    Because all request element is deserialized a UpdateReq, so this can only work for Update/Insert request.

    Design Memo
    This is a strong evidence showing that we need anson.

    Author:
    odys-z@github.com
